data_facts_with_vis_data.paragraph: According to Goldman Sachs, gold prices will reach $2,300 by 2025. According to Bank of America analysts, prices may test $2,500 if inflation stays high and the Fed pauses rate hikes. However, Citigroup shows a more cautious picture, with analysts predicting that gold will remain near $2,200 (unless something big happens like a war).

facts.fact_content: Goldman Sachs predicts gold prices will reach $2,300 by 2025.
Bank of America analysts predict gold prices may test $2,500 if inflation stays high and the Fed pauses rate hikes.
Citigroup analysts predict gold will remain near $2,200 unless something big happens.
